logic_summary: Updated Right SRT to 10 dB HL and Left SRT to 30 dB HL in Speech Audiometry results.
Replaced the entire Acoustic Reflexes test object with the detailed structure provided in the remarks.

value.name: Acoustic reflexes
value.key_findings: Right ipsilateral reflexes present at 500-2000 Hz, absent at 4000 Hz. Left ipsilateral reflexes absent at all frequencies. Contralateral reflexes with probe in right ear (Stim L/Meas R) show elevated threshold at 1000 Hz only. Contralateral reflexes with probe in left ear (Stim R/Meas L) absent at all frequencies. Pattern suggests left efferent (facial nerve) pathway pathology.

numeric_results.Reflex Decay: CNT (Could Not Test) due to absent/elevated contralateral thresholds
